remarks.para: May be inoperative provided valve is deactivated closed after engines are started.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "APU ISOL VALVE INOP CLOSED". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: The APU bleed air shutoff valve is installed in the upper outboard aft corner of the left body gear wheel well. Access to the valve is available in the body gear wheel well. To deactivate the APU bleed air valve, you must put the valve in the CLOSED position and disconnect the electrical connector.
Deactivate the APU Bleed Air Valve (AMM 36-11-09/201)

numlitem.para: Make sure that the landing gear ground lock pins are installed (AMM 09-11-00/201).
Put the APU BLEED switch (P5 Overhead Panel) in the OFF position. Wait approximately 10 seconds for the valve to close.
Open and collar the 6H22 APU ISO VLV AIR SUPPLY PWR circuit breaker on the P6 main power distribution panel.
Examine the position indicator on the actuator housing. If the position indicator is not in the CLOSED position, turn the manual drive until the valve is in the CLOSED position.
Disconnect, cap and stow the electrical connector from the APU bleed air valve.
Install cap on the connection on the valve's actuator housing.
